About.name: Joseph Fallait
About.title: Senior at Boston College
About.description: Joseph Fallait is a senior pursuing a double major in Computer Science and Economics at Boston College. He works on-campus as a resident assistant, and is particularly interested in the field of Data Science. Having previously worked at social media and biotech startups, his passion is incorporating data analysis into a variety of disciplines. In his free time, he has been learning guitar and piano and is currently pursuing employment for Summer 2021.

Projects.title: Neural Network Classification of ASL Fingerspelling
Projects.authors: Jack Miller, Jerry Yang, Aidan Shea, Shane Fitzpatrick, Joseph Fallait, and Sean Curley
Projects.description: In this project, we used a Neural Network and principles of computer vision to identify fingerspelled ASL letters.

Projects.title: Visualization of Christmas Music
Projects.authors: Joseph Fallait, Andres Fernandez, Yun Tong
Projects.description: In this project, we used D3.js to visualize Christmas music and its lyrics throughout the years.

Projects.title: Naive Bayes and SVM Spam Classification
Projects.description: In this project, I classified spam messages while comparing Naive Bayes and Support Vector Machine models.

News.title: Began final semester at Boston College.
